title: [DREAMER] Implement System3 Control Supervisor placeholder functions
overview:
System3 Control Supervisor relies on placeholder functions that return mock data or have empty implementations. This prevents proper system health monitoring, intervention determination, and resource management.

**Motivation:** System3 is the control layer of the VSM architecture. Without proper implementation of health monitoring and intervention logic, the system cannot self-regulate or maintain homeostasis.

**Success criteria:**
- query_system_status/1 returns real system metrics
- determine_health_status/1 analyzes actual health data
- Intervention actions are properly executed
- Resource limit policies are enforced
- Telemetry tracks control actions

**Technical constraints:**
- Must integrate with telemetry/metrics system
- Needs access to process and VM metrics
- Control actions must be safe
- Should not cause cascading failures

**In scope:**
- Implement query_system_status/1 with real metrics
- Implement determine_health_status/1 with health rules
- Add proper intervention execution
- Implement resource limit checking
- Write tests for control actions
**Out of scope:**
- System3 architecture (already exists)
- VSM principles (documented elsewhere)
- UI for monitoring (separate)

**Signals:** priority: medium, urgency: System3 incomplete
